lesson.subtitle: Numeral Declension I: Time & Dates
lesson.description: Learner can tell the time using formal and informal expressions
objectives: Learner can tell the time using formal and informal expressions
Learner can state and understand dates in all required cases
Learner can use months in genitive and prepositional cases correctly
